summary: 2 Nif sculpts for Argonians, inspired by kobolds/lizardfolk & bangaa. (Also viera.)
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=6][b]JE's Beastly Nifs[/b][/size][/u]

[b]Two hand-sculpted head meshes for male & female Argonians.[/b]

Racemenu required to import them, or Nifmerge if you just want to paste them over an existing NPC. 
(Or ECE, if you prefer. I don't know if it can import nifs, because I use RM exclusively.)

[b][size=3]To use:[/size][/b]
Download manually, unzip, then dump the nifs into your Chargen folder.
(Data/SKSE/Plugins/Chargen)
Sculpted around UNP & SOS bodies, if that matters to anyone.

[b][size=3]KNOWN ISSUES:[/size][/b]
-Mouth part (teeth & tongue) do not scale with the head. There will be a hole if you open wide & have a look-see.
-Bad sculpting, likely neck-seams, asymetrical... I rushed things, then got sick of it and threw in the towel. :T
-Lizardfolk (thin-nosed) head has tongue clipping when mouth is maxed out. 

[b]PERMISSIONS:[/b]
Use however you want, no credit required.
While it would be nice to be mentioned, I spent less than a day on these and they do have a lot of problems, so IDGAF.
HAVE FUN

[b]BACKSTORY[/b]
Once upon a time, I pumped out some garbage, 30 second presets as a proof-of-concept for kobolds, lizardfolk, etc since the scaly races get no love. Then, I sat on my ass and whined about it, waiting for someone with any sort of time or talent to take up the challenge.

[i]Years later[/i]: No one did. (As far as I've seen anyway.)

So I decided to be the change I wanted to see and spent a couple weeks painstakingly modeling a few versions... long nosed, round faced, long eared bangaa-types, all carefully sculpted so their textures weren't distorted at all...

Then my computer ate those files. 

NO BACKUPS, [i]of course.[/i] orz

This was attempt at recreating them, before I got completely burnt out. 
Instead of being lovingly sculpted, they're the products of overly-judicious Inflate & Deflate use, with a tiny bit of straighting out here and there.
The female versions are just the male sculpts with hastily Deflated necks. Neck-seams almost guaranteed, though I did fix that part a little, too.

[b][size=4]As a bonus, I threw in my Ronso-"Viera" sculpt, too. [/size][/b]

It's just the New Female head with its ears stuffed inside, scalp smooshed to fit standard hairs, and touched up eyes (since I use the race as a replacer and the eyes/mouth are busted in my game. Your mileage may vary!).
Requires Ronso for Skyrim, viera ears from another mod, and non-blue textures from somewhere.

Final Note:
Upon spellchecking this page, I realized that I miss-named the nifs lol.
Thin-nose should have been bangaa & dragon-face should have been kobold.
Makes absolutely no difference, content-wise, so oh well :V
author: JerisEnigma
